SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.jerkar.tool
Annotation Type JkProject

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface JkProject

Specifies that the annotated element is a build of a another project. This annotated element is supposed to be a JkBuild or its subclasses. The expected value is the referenced project path relative to the project the annotated element belong.
So for example if there is a project FooA and and a project FooB belonging to the same folder. In project FooA we can reference project FooB by annotating a JkBuild field with value ../FooB.

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.String value
          Dependee project relative path
 

Element Detail

value

public abstract java.lang.String value
Dependee project relative path
